title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 81.6 - Vehicle rebuilders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 81.6 - Vehicle rebuilders

State Regulations
A vehicle rebuilder who purchases vehicles for the purpose
of dismantling same for parts or for scrap must be registered as a vehicle
dismantler pursuant to the provisions of this Part. A vehicle rebuilder who
sells rebuilt vehicles must be registered as a dealer pursuant to section
415
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. A vehicle rebuilder who engages in both functions
must be registered both as a vehicle dismantler and a dealer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
81.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
